key.name: syntax-theme
key.description: The syntax theme to use for the editor.

key.name: enable-syntax-theme
key.description: Whether to use a syntax theme in the editor.

key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: Whether to show line numbers in the editor.

key.name: show-right-margin
key.description: Whether to show a margin on the right side of the editor.

key.name: show-right-margin-position
key.summary: The column at which the right margin should be shown
key.description: Sets the column where the right margin will appear when 'show-right-margin' is enabled

key.name: wrap-text
key.description: Whether to wrap text in the editor.

key.name: show-spaces
key.description: Whether to show spaces and tabulation in the editor.

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: Whether to highlight the line with the cursor in the editor.

key.name: replace-tabs
key.description: Use spaces instead of tabs in the editor.

key.name: tab-width
key.description: Set the width of tabulation in characters in the editor.

key.name: auto-indent
key.description: Auto-indent code in the editor.

key.name: spell-check
key.description: Spell check using gtkspell.

key.name: spell-check-lang
key.description: Selected language for spell check.

key.name: editor-font-size
key.description: Font size for the editor in points.

key.name: editor-font-family
key.description: Font family for the editor. Empty string means use system monospace font.

key.name: use-ctrl-wheel-zoom
key.summary: Use Ctrl + mouse wheel for font size
key.description: When enabled, Ctrl + mouse wheel will change the editor font size.

key.name: add-trailing-newline
key.description: Add a newline at the end of the file when saving if there isn't one already.

key.name: css-theme
key.description: The css theme to use for the preview.

key.name: css-toggle
key.summary: Use a CSS theme in the live preview

key.name: mathjs-toggle
key.description: Use js back-end to render math in the live preview.

key.name: math-backend
key.description: Select the js math rendering back-end.

key.name: highlight-toggle
key.description: Use highlight.js in the live preview.

key.name: mermaid-toggle
key.description: Use mermaid.js to show diagram in the live preview.

key.name: highlight-theme
key.description: The css theme to use for the synthax highlight.

key.name: charter-toggle
key.description: Enable Charter extension in the live preview.

key.name: preview-zoom-level
key.description: Zoom level of the preview widget

key.name: view-mode
key.description: Controls how to organize the editor and preview areas on the screen.

key.name: enable-dark-mode
key.description: When this is enabled, the dark variant of the current gtk theme will be used.

key.name: editor-pane-width
key.summary: Editor pane width (in Dual Pane mode)

key.name: enable-scroll-sync
key.description: Synchronize scrolling between editor and preview panes.

key.name: recent-files
key.description: List of recently opened files (up to 5 entries).

key.name: auto-save-on-focus-out
key.summary: Auto save when focus is lost
key.description: Automatically save unsaved files when the application loses focus.

key.name: auto-save-periodic
key.description: Automatically save unsaved files at regular intervals.

key.name: auto-save-period
key.description: Time interval in seconds for periodic auto save (5-600 seconds).
